seo.title: Manarola Camping 2025 | Campgrounds & Outdoor Stays
seo.description: Camping options near Manarola. Campgrounds in the hills with sea views, nature immersion, and budget-friendly stays.

body.title: Camping & Outdoor Stays
body.subtitle: Camp in the hills above Cinque Terre. Budget-friendly options with stunning views and easy access to all five villages.

features.title: 5 Terre Camping
features.description: Closest campground to Manarola. Located in Volastra with shuttle bus service.

features.title: Camping Acquadolce
features.description: Near Riomaggiore. Tent sites, bungalows, and camper spots. Pool and restaurant.

features.title: La Sfinge Camping
features.description: Terraced campsite in the hills. Spectacular views and hiking trail access.

features.title: Facilities
features.description: All sites have bathrooms, showers, cooking areas, and WiFi. Some have pools.

features.title: Transportation
features.description: Shuttle buses to villages or short walk to train stations. Some sites rent bikes.

features.title: Budget-Friendly
features.description: From â‚¬10-30 per person/night. Much cheaper than hotels while staying in nature.
